name: GeyserSteam
description: GeyserSteam is the only premium plug-and-play steam room.  Installation requires no plumbing or permits, it can heat to 120 degrees with 100% humidity, and works both outdoors and indoors.
one_liner: GeyserSteam is the only premium plug-and-play steam room.  Installation requires no plumbing or permits, it can heat to 120 degrees with 100% humidity, and works both outdoors and indoors.
industry: Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability and wellness
